name: NSButton.ButtonType
desc: Button types that you can specify using setButtonType(_:).

items.name: case momentaryPushIn
items.desc: A button that illuminates when the user clicks it.

items.name: case momentaryLight
items.desc: A button that displays a highlight when the user clicks it and returns to its normal state when the user releases it.

items.name: case momentaryChange
items.desc: A button that displays its alternate content when clicked and returns to its normal content when the user releases it.

items.name: case pushOnPushOff
items.desc: A button that switches between on and off states with each click.

items.name: case onOff
items.desc: A button that switches between a normal and emphasized bezel on each click.

items.name: case toggle
items.desc: A button that switches between its normal and alternate content on each click.

items.name: case radio
items.desc: A button that displays a single selected value from group of possible choices.

items.name: case accelerator
items.desc: A button that sends repeating actions as pressure changes occur.

items.name: case multiLevelAccelerator
items.desc: A button that allows for a configurable number of stepped pressure levels and provides tactile feedback as the user reaches each step.
